text: I meet two of the world's biggest
philanthropists Bill and Melinda Gates
to find out more about the science and
technology projects they helped to fund
you really have to be able to see the
amazing progress that we're making and
see what did we do right and double down
on those things so that we make even
more rapid progress we step inside the
mosquito lab to see what's being done in
the fight against malaria I am a strong
believer in applying technology to
biological problems and we meet the
South African father turned innovator
who wants to dramatically reduce the
high number of infant deaths in his
country the things that kill babies are
very preventable it's just empowering
parents and communities with the right
knowledge
